title.rendered: WESTERN FILTERS Nissan Patrol 2007 3.0L ZD30 – Pre Filter Water Separator Kit Fuel Manager FM619DPK

content.rendered:
Fuel Manager Fuel Filter / Water Separator Kit for:
Nissan Patrol (2007 on) 3.0L Common Rail ZD30

This Filter unit is to be used as a Pre Filter to separate water & contaminates thus avoiding costly repairs due to poor fuel quality. The kit comes with comprehensive fitting instructions and everything you will need & even where to fit it !

Kit FM619PK Contents :
• 1x Fuel Filtration Unit Fuel Manager
Made by Stanadyne in the USA !
(Filters down to 30 Microns !)
• Mounting Bolts, washers & Nyloc nuts.
• Spare 30 Micron Filter.
• 4 Mtr of 3/8″ Quality Fuel hose.
• Specially Designed Filter Mounting Bracket.
• 3/8″ Inch Straight Barb Fittings.
• Blanking Plugs.
• Hose Clamps
• Thread Paste Sealant (6ml Tube)

Download PDF Info >

Install all fittings and plugs with the thread paste.
